name: melee io
description:
melee io

A 2d top-down sword fighting games. Its inspired by the souls series and has some souls-like mechanics. Its a simple game where you can fight any multitude of enemy combos (amount and difficulty).

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • LEFT CLICK to attack.
  • F to block/parry an enemy. If timed correctly the victim will be stunned and damage to you will be nullified.
  • SPACEBAR to dash. Dashing gives you a boost and gives you iframes (invincibility frames). If a dash is timed correctly you can completely block an enemies attack.

Combining a mix of blocks, dashes, dodges, and attacks can give you an advantage over your enemies. Try mixing up your play styles too.

The purple bar below your health bar is the cooldown for blocking. When the purple bar is full your block is ready.

Updates:

I am actively working on this game. I will push out updates at least every week. If not I'm busy. Any suggestions in the comments is appreciated and will be considered in future updates.
